body:

title: Who do you guys think the next Sr Should be?

replies.body:
Well, that's interesting a thing, but you should include all people that are moderators for a reasonable amount of time so no one gets left out.
Also people may get upset when they don't get any votes.
And apart of that I don't think they are searching for more/new seniors.
